DOC.brief_title: Phenylephrine Dose Mode Administration Spinal Anesthesia Induced Hypotension
DOC.detailed_description: Phenylephrine administer one 3 regimen : Intermittent bolus 50 mcg , Intermittent bolus 100 mcg , continuous infusion 100 mcg/min . The infusion contain either phenylephrine normal saline ( placebo ) . Subjects randomize receive bolus dose receive placebo infusion . Subjects randomize receive phenylephrine infusion normal saline ( placebo ) bolus syringe . Baseline blood pressure obtain prior surgery maintain use drug . Blood pressure heart rate monitor usual standard care . Continuous cardiac output hemodynamic monitoring obtain use CNAP ( Tm ) similar ( equivalent ) monitoring device . Blood pressure maintain 90-120 % baseline utilizing infusion and/or bolus 3 regimen .
DOC.criteria: schedule cesarean delivery age > /=18 year age > /= 37 week EGA ASA status IIII allergy medication use study nonEnglish speaking
